sen.j: 延福寺（えんぷくじ）は、亀岡市にある高野山真言宗の寺院。
sen.e: Enpuku-ji Temple is a temple of Koyasan Shingon Sect located in Kameoka City.
Enpuku-ji Temple is a temple of Koyasan Shingon Sect located in Kameoka City.
Enpuku-ji Temple is a temple of Koyasan Shingon Sect located in Kameoka City.

sen.j: 1154年、文覚上人により開創される
sen.e: It was established by Mongaku shonin (The Venerable Mongaku) in 1154.
It was established by Mongaku shonin (The Venerable Mongaku) in 1154.
It was established by Mongaku shonin (The Venerable Mongaku) in 1154.

sen.j: 重要文化財 - 十三重の塔（1358年、祐弁が建立）
sen.e: Important Cultural Property: Thirteen-storied pagoda (erected by Yuben(祐弁) in 1358)
